entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
